title: Magick Candle in Indianapolis, Indiana
description: As the oldest metaphysical shop in the Indianapolis area, Magick Candle is a must stop for those on any spiritual path. They carry everything from chime candles to coyote taxidermy and anything you can imagine in between. Owners Michelle and Jan are incredibly knowledgeable practitioners themselves and are willing to answer questions and help others along their path. The store also houses the Cauldron School of Metaphysics, where they teach countless classes on the path.
excerpt: Tucked into the heart of historic Irvington, this 56-year-old metaphysical shop specializes in the olde ways.

html:
As the oldest metaphysical shop in the Indianapolis area, Magick Candle is a must stop for those on any spiritual path. They carry everything from chime candles to coyote taxidermy and anything you can imagine in between.

Owners Michelle and Jan are incredibly knowledgeable practitioners themselves and are willing to answer questions and help others along their path. The store also houses the Cauldron School of Metaphysics, where they teach countless classes on the path.
